snippet.title: Wonkbook: 8 million is not the only Obamacare number that counts
snippet.description: Here's why Obamacare is not just one number.

snippet.title: Meet the guy who's supposed to stop labor's decline
snippet.description: The financialized economic model doesn't work for workers, says AFL-CIO policy director Damon Silvers. Changing it won't be easy.

snippet.title: Can Damon Silvers save organized labor?
snippet.description: Damon Silvers has spent his life appreciating the value of unions. Now his work is no less than to save them.

snippet.title: Panel discussion: On the edge of change
The Download: Human Genome Sciences layoffs will continue into next year
snippet.description: The biotech firm undergoes 'internal restructuring' after acquisition by GlaxoSmithKline.

snippet.title: Wonkbook: Is the housing market back?
snippet.description: 38 percent. That's the percentage increase in housing starts from this September as compared to last September.

snippet.title: Md. officials set up shop in Moscow
snippet.description: MOSCOW - Snow had been falling heavily and steadily since morning, but if that would be a deterrence at home, it did not stop the state of Maryland from planting its flag in Russia the other day, the first state to open its own trade office here.

snippet.title: Maryland plants flag in Russia, seeking business
snippet.description: On a snowy day, Maryland opens a trade office in Moscow, looking for business investment from Russia, where weather is the least of the hurdles.

snippet.title: Also Playing
snippet.description: Capsule reviews of recent releases playing in area theaters. For older movies, see the Movie Directory. A star (*) denotes a movie recommended by our critics.
